item.title: A (rough) layout guide
item.description: I think it’d be good to document the way I’m planning on laying out the structure of the wiki going forward. As it stands, this is the layout of the wiki’s repo: A bunch of dev files These generally are prefixed with an underscore (ex, “_data”) and for the most part, you don’t ever need to worry about that. The actual wiki docs this is under the folder /wiki/ and is divided into

item.title: New Wiki, Who 'dis?
item.description: Hi friends! This wiki is just getting started, but I think it’d be cool to lay out some ground work for where I (and the rest of the team) are trying to go. As it stands, I have a couple goals I want to get done before I turn our contributors loose on the wiki. Get our base pages and resources set. This would be all the nav links, contribution pages, any readme stuff, all the important shit.
